snippet: Hackers posted a file online that they claimed was a confidential glimpse into Symantec's Norton Antivirus program. They have threatened to release source code for the security giant's flagship antivirus product. Symantec said it was investigating...
abstract: Hackers posted a file online that they claimed was a confidential glimpse into Symantec's Norton Antivirus program. They have threatened to release source code for the security giant's flagship antivirus product. Symantec said it was investigating the claim. The hacker group calls itself the Lords of Dharmaraja.
lead_paragraph: Hackers have posted a file online that they claim is a confidential glimpse into Symantec's Norton Antivirus program and have threatened to release source code for the security giant's flagship antivirus product.

headline.main: Hackers Threaten to Post Source Code for Symantec Product
